item.description:
7 pm – Professional Development Speaker (Mary Lou Lamontagne)

8 pm – General Meeting

Come join us for our Professional Development Speaker and regularly scheduled meeting. Mary Lou Lamontagne, US Tour Manager, Destiny Africa Children's Choir- Mary is going to talk about her role as the US tour manager for The Destiny Africa Children’s Choir. The choir is a channel for the voice of millions of suffering children in Africa and the rest of the world.

We allot roughly 45 minutes for the speaker then we begin the meeting at 8pm and discuss all the exciting happenings of the club! Come for one event, or both! All are welcome, so please feel free to bring a friend! We will likely head out for a drink or two after the meeting, so plan to make a night of it! :D
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into 116 Beacon, down the hall & take the stairs on the left going down. Follow the signs for Boston Rotaract to the Trustee's Reading Room (TRR)!

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Boston Rotaract Speaker and General Meeting
